Get FPDS Data

fpds_get_data.Rd

An iterative function to query FPDS data by PIID using FPDS Atom Feed. See https://www.fpds.gov/fpdsng_cms/index.php/en/worksite for more information.

Usage

fpds_get_data(
  piid = NULL,
  return = "xml",
  include_related = TRUE,
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

piid

A PIID value or vector of values.

return

If "raw", output raw HTML file.

verbose

Logical, to display progressbar.

Value

A named list, consisting of two dataframes: AWARDS and IDV.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
fpds_get_data(piid="XXXXXXXXX")
} # }
